name: Busty & Buster
description:
Busty and Buster was on a space mission

when they crash landed in planet mangoz

upon there arrival the mangoz mug them

and the duo needs to get the rainbow crystals

so they could get back home

COLLECT ALL THE RAINBOW CRYSTALS

CONTROL 2 PLAYERS AT THE SAME TIME

FOR HUAWEI USERS CLICK THE ICON
